description:
A clean bike is a happy bike. This kit includes everything you need to keep your bike's moving parts free of debris, grime and contaminants.

  • Variety of brushes and cleaning tools to clean your drive train, rims, brakes and frame
  • Cleaner helps remove dirt and is easy to apply in a spray bottle
  • Bike Protect prevents corrosion and is easy to apply after your cleaning regimen is done
  • Brushes include: detailing, two prong, claw, soft wash, and sponge
  • Storage tub included
  • Suitable for all bikes
name: Muc-Off 8-in1 Bike Cleaning Kit
